entity.sourceSql: select * from ( select rownum rnum, a.* from (select mle.uuid, mle.optionpersonal, mle.subject, mle.messagedate, mle.recipients, mle.mailbox_uuid, m.messagebody from messagelistentry mle, message m where mle.uuid = m.mle_uuid order by mle.uuid) a where rownum <= {limit} ) where rnum > {offset}
